short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the key takeaways of articles, blogs, pdfs, and manually inputted text saving your time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Untanglify Extension is a productivity tool that uses AI to extract key information from text and displays it to the user saving them the most precious thing they have, their time. The extension can accept manually inputed text, pdfs, text the user highlights, and the main content of the webpage the user is viewing. 

Summarized text is then displayed on Untanglify.com where the user can view their recently summarized text, create bundles or groups of articles to read, invite their friends to see what their friends are reading, or even create groups to quickly share their recent reads. Users can even rate the articles they and their friends read, all for free.
